description: MODULE files must have a corresponding .INFO file that tells Drupal about the module. The INFO file must have the same filename prefix as the MODULE file and must be located in the same directory. The files should be installed to the /​modules/​ directory, which is typically located at sites/​mysite/​modules/​ .
NOTE: While .PHP files include a closing ?> PHP tag when the source code has ended, MODULE files do not.
